text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(Models with grace, photo compositions as planned, lighting… 
The approaches taken for Shion's adjustments and the issues 
Cheval faces…)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(It shouldn't be a stretch to say that they all reflect perfectly 
in the final product… It shouldn't, and yet…)

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: You look troubled. Is something bothering you?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's just… As I was reviewing the photos, something 
sort of… felt off. Although they turned out close to what 
I envisioned… they still lack something…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: These aren't quite the amazing PR photos I… Ah, I apologize. This is my job as the planner. I'll think over it again myself.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …No need. In that case, I will mull over it as well.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Duramente…… ?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
…As I said, we'lI aim for perfection. I do not plan to 
settle for less. I… participated in this photo shoot 
carrying the pride of my family's name.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
For my family… my clan, only perfection will do. 
In the name of my family… my clan, I will not bring them shame.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
We clashed in our pursuit of the ideal outcome, and could gain 
strength from each other. Precisely because we are guided by 
the same goal, we arrived at the same destination.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Because of that, we share the same 
perspective — 心領神会 (No words needed)…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Because we both carry the pride of our families and strive for 
the same goal, we've pushed each other thus far. And now, 
we both strive to lead the photo shoot to an ideal conclusion.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
…You're right. Let's work together. To create the greatest 
PR photos —— to achieve the ideal outcome, befitting the 
names of our families.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
So these are the photos… At a glance, Vivlos' and my photos 
are turning out as you envisioned, and I can see the direction 
intended for Shion.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, but to surpass "nicely bringing together 
everything I envisioned", some drastic changes 
are needed… If such a thing can be done ——

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
—— It might be through that girl who has 
not yet brought out her true potential.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …In the end, none of my photos were given the OK…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
The more I think, the more my head spins and my mind blanks… 
Somehow… I have to do something about it.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
If I try to think of a beautiful, cool model… I do always 
come back to sis as the best reference.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
—— That's right, if I can replicate my image of her… it will 
definitely turn out well this time…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Calm and collected at all times… exuding a splendid aura…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Yes, like this… it should feel something like this… Uu… although it feels nothing alike when I'm doing it…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Maybe… if I do something a photo model does… 
Something like…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: How… How about this…?

text_block_list.name: Verxina?
text_block_list.text:
Looks great♪ Then, next, if you put your hands like this, 
I'm sure you'll look very cute!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …………Vi-Vivlos!? Wh… What are you doing here…?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Aha, I just came back from the pool! I'm more curious, what are you doing, Chevacchi, posing like our big sis?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Wh… Why do you jump to that conclusion…?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Eeeh? Of course I'd know. I've read every magazine 
featuring her. But is that really what Crown's looking 
for from you here, Chevacchi?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I have nowhere else to draw from… although it's 
a dead end now that you poked fun at me for it.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm… Ah! In that case, let's go for a change of pace☆

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
You like quiet places, right? The pool here is gorgeous, 
quiet, and huge, it's just the best♪ Come on, go, go♪

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Wh-What's with you… Alright, I get it. 
…You're so pushy…

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: …Hopefully this will cheer you up.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …It really is a quiet and beautiful place… There's barely anyone around, too… I can definitely relax here… hm?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I believe the camera will be at that angle… 
I will stand here. I see, I see.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …First shot, facing the camera, croisé devant. Second shot, arabesque.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Uwahh!? Wh-Why are you here, Cheval!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Umm… for a change of pace… 
What about you, Shion… what are you doing here…?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Well～ …Ahaha. Rehearsing… or something like that. 
…Tomorrow I definitely can't afford to fail.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Tomorrow…? Ah, come to think of it, you'll be doing a 
ballet-themed photo shoot… So it's for that?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Yes… but today, there were many areas I couldn't do well in… 
Crown had to cover for me by adjusting the plan.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I'll make sure I can showcase my experience at the shoot 
tomorrow, without needing a backup plan. After all, it's rare 
an opportunity to be the "principal" comes around.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Principal…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Photo model…? Me… a model…! 
…I'd like to try… I wanna try!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
To be photoed means to be the incontestable "principal" 
subject, right? Furthermore, I was invited with plans for 
photos with a ballet motif…!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Well… when it came to the real deal, I wasn't able to do 
as well as I thought. Kind of a pathetic outcome, haha…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
So that's how it was for you. Um, I… also came here 
wanting to do my best as a model, but I was no good…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
But… at least you properly recognised how to improve. 
Meanwhile, I… am completely clueless on what to do…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Somehow, I'm reminded of when we first met. 
You got anxious about things easily…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Whenever something happened, you'd always say things 
like that, looking down on yourself. At first, you wouldn't 
even look at me, haha.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …You're right. In the end, I didn't change much from then…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …………………Cheval, hold still a moment.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Eh? Wha…?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
This arm goes like this, then… palm facing up. 
This leg goes at an angle like this.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
This is a ballet form…? 
…Whoa, my balance…?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Uwah!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
This form… isn't maintained purely 
through muscle strength, is it?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, that was basically my experience when I first 
started too. Countless attempts and countless failures, 
never giving up until I could do it.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: However… I'm sure you've done the same before.
